category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: GCS_classify_type
preference.preference_description: Determines whether items/item revisions are created and classified for components with connection points. Siemens PLM Software recommends you set this preference to ItemRevision. When assigning connection points to nonclassifying classification objects (ICOs), a new classified object is created to receive the connection points. To make the target object a classified resource, the target ICO must classify a newly-created object, usually an item revision or a similar classified object type. Use this preference to define the target object's type. Siemens PLM Software recommends you set the following preferences to the same value as this preference: MRMClassifyResource, ICS_classify_new, ICS_mapping_target_type. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be Item, ItemRevision, or a valid custom item or item revision type.
